title: 89/421/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 June 1989 authorizing the Hellenic Republic to restrict the marketing of seed of certain varieties of an agricultural plant species (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 22 June 1989
authorizing the Hellenic Republic to restrict the marketing of seed of certain varieties of an agricultural plant species
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(89/421/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Hellenic Republic is hereby authorized to prohibit the marketing in its territory of seed of the following varieties listed in the 1989 common catalogue of varieties of agricultural plant species:
Oil and fibre plants
Glycine max (L.) Merr. (soya bean)
Effi
Maple Arrow
Olima
Sito
Ultra.
The authorization given in Article 1 shall be withdrawn as soon as it is established that the conditions thereof are no longer satisfied.
The Hellenic Republic shall notify the Commission and the other Member States of the date from which it makes use of the authorization under Article 1 and the detailed methods to be followed.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 June 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
